amendment.description: Amendment provides an exception to boilers that operate without electricity from energy efficiency requirements in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 110-300 to except boilers that operate without the need for electricity supply from the energy efficiency requirements in section 9003(4) of the bill, regarding appliance efficiency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pitts amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
